artist: Jack Larsen Jack Lenor Larsen Inc. Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. Blue, drk teal, olive warp. Drk teal, kelly & metallic blue weft. Twill. Machine edged all 4 sides.  Stapled to inside mat folder with Larsen descriptive label.
"H-8B" written on outside of folder. (blue, green)
title: Pomegranate
